Even Hitler has issues with ArcGIS

Posted on February 24, 2010

After the video on Hitler’s issues with peer-review, this time we see him complaining about ArcGIS. Sounds so familiar… not sure why…

Me? I’ll keep using GRASS, QGIS, R, and other FOSS-GIS.
